article.title: U.S. Army Purchases 1,000 Throwbots
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ReconRobotics Incorporated, Minneapolis, Minnesota, was awarded a $13,900,000 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of a maximum of 1,000 Throwbot XT robots.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
